ee anuwa ohuta wenama tharaga thahanamakda panawa thibini.aprel masayedi dakunu aprikanu pila samaga pawathi ekdina tharagayakadi nodawi lakunu 200 k labagath indiya supiri pithikaru sachin thendulkar wasara 40 ka ek dina ithihasaye dwithwa shathakayak labu prathama pithikaru lesa loka warthawak thabuweya.wartha pita wartha thabana thendulkar me masaye dakunu aprikanuwan samaga senchuriyan hi pawathi test tharagayedi shathakayak ras kota test shathaka 50 k labu lowa prathama pithikaru lesatada wartha pothata ekwimata samath wiya.me wasare pawathi amerikanu dolar miliyana 225 ka thyaga mallak himi indiya pi්ramiyar lig tharagamalawe surathawa chennayi pilata himi wiya.
